section.p: For the third time in a row, you lift the stranger clear off his feet and smash him hard against the deck. This time he raises his hand in submission.
‘Enough. You win,’ he says, staggering to his feet. ‘You’re the strongest there is.’
So saying, he jumps back down to his boat and sails off.

Increase your unwounded Stamina score by 5 points . Also
add 1 to COMBAT . Then .
